Class GameState

java.lang.Object
Models.GameState
public class GameState extends Object
The GameState class manages the state of the game, including players, the board, and game-related logic such as turns, movements, and objectives.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description

    Constructs a new GameState with the specified players and board.
